channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Blocked/silted up drain near pedestrian crossing, 19th January
item.description:
Ideally ALL these drains on this MAIN A222 would be systematically cleared using a COMPETENT contractor…… As per attached 7am Monday 18 January photos…..

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Summer Hill, Chislehurst, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unswept footway with uncollected leaves and fallen tree branch sections, 19th January
item.description:
Why are our footways NOT being swept as per the published schedule Bromley Council? These leaves have been here for weeks, and other sections of this well used, fairly steep footway have broken branch sections adding to trip/slip risk…. As per attached 7am Monday 19 January photos…..

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Summer Hill, Chislehurst, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose drain cover causing noice when a car is driven past, 19th January
item.description:
Drain cover uneven fitting causing very loud noise when cars are driving over it, 24hrs a day. Unsafe for traffic and pedestrians. Copers court Rd near new Beckenham train station and opposite Urquhart Court and near park road Very dangerous .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Urquhart Court, New Beckenham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
